embed.description: **Pom** is a **Shade** that the player can summon by using the **Pom Mask**. A special trait of the Pom Mask is that it will summon Pom as an enemy and on the enemy side of the board in a location of choice. This means Pom's effect of "adding barrage" applies to the player, as the player is the enemy to Pom

fields.name: Effects
fields.value: While active add **Barrage** to all enemies. **Summoned**

embed.title: Pom
